entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 6:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: NNE 36 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
